body:
It was correct but giving this warning:
```
/pytorch/torch/lib/libshm/manager.cpp: In function 'int main(int, char**)':
/pytorch/torch/lib/libshm/manager.cpp:112:10: warning: types may not be defined in a for-range-declaration
     for (struct pollfd &pfd: pollfds) {
          ^~~~~~
```
